Un will be building most modern hospital. Including a separate wing for dissidents – complete with the latest in anti-aircraft gun technology. Rest of hospital will be devoted to party elite.

Uh, we provide for the common people as well. There is one bottle of aspirin which can be shared by every 1,000 citizens. Party will broadcast old re-runs of “General Hospital” dubbed in Korean so we can pretend there are available doctors. Everyone needs to lose weight, so no hospital cafeteria for you. And lots of orderlies to provide for the mandatory ass-kicking the people have come to love and respect.

We will beat this Chineseimperialistlackydog coronavirus if its the last thing our precious and beloved people do. Although it is admittedly hard to tell if the death rate for the coronavirus is higher or lower than the death rate caused by merely being a North Korean.

Breitbart: North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un called  Link: https://kcnawatch.org/newstream/1584535824-670971417/supreme-leader-kim-jong-un-makes-speech-at-ground-breaking-ceremony-for-construction-of-pyongyang-general-hospital/ for the construction of “modern general hospital” this week to “better protect the precious health and safety of our people,” despite the fact his country denies having any cases of Chinese coronavirus.

According to state propaganda outlet Rodung Sinmun, Kim visited the hospital construction site in Pyongyang on Tuesday, where he delivered a speech entitled “Let Us Build the Pyongyang General Hospital in an Excellent Way, Greeting the 75th Founding Anniversary of the Workers’ Party of Korea.” Kim’s presence in the capital was notable as reports surfaced that he had taken to hiding Link: https://www.breitbart.com/asia/2020/03/11/report-kim-jong-un-fled-pyongyang-fearing-chinese-coronavirus/ in Wonsan, a coastal resort town, out of fear of contracting the coronavirus himself. more Link: https://www.breitbart.com/national-security/2020/03/19/miserably-self-critical-kim-jong-un-orders-hospital-built-denies-coronavirus-cases/
